product_name: Mountaineers Books Hiking the Wonderland Trail: The Complete Guide to Mount Rainier's Premier Trail
long_description: Hiking the Wonderland Trail: The Complete Guide to Mount Rainier's Premier Trail guides you through the ins and outs of undertaking this memorable hiking trip around Mount Rainier.
